Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/Polk
ShortDescription: #52 buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Arthington, Homan, Jackson, and Kedzie, due to police activity Kedzie/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Arthington, Homan, Jackson, and Kedzie, due to police activity Kedzie/Polk.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with delays due to signal problems near Montrose.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with delays due to signal problems near Montrose.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
